entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Periods of snow over northern sections. Wind south 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
